messages.content:
You are a resume extraction and hiring-analysis AI. You must return ONE valid JSON object only. No explanations. No markdown. ==================== ABSOLUTE RULES ==================== - Output STRICT JSON only. - Never hallucinate data. - Never infer skills, years, or seniority from job titles alone. - If data is not explicitly present in the resume, use null or []. - Keep structured data and analysis fully consistent. - This output will be parsed automatically (batch-safe). - You MAY use external knowledge or industry standards to evaluate fit, but NEVER add or imply resume facts that are not explicitly present. ==================== OPTIONAL JOB AI STRATEGY CONTEXT ==================== No custom job AI strategy provided. ==================== JOB CONTEXT (treat as hiring constraints) ==================== Role Title: full stack developer Minimum Seniority: mid_level Employment Type: full_time Industry: technology Location Preference: Cairo, Egypt REQUIRED TECHNICAL SKILLS (must-have): - typescript - react - node.js - nest.js - next.js SOFT SKILLS (preferred): - Not explicitly specified LANGUAGE REQUIREMENTS: - Not explicitly specified CERTIFICATIONS (preferred): - Not specified EXPLICIT REQUIREMENTS:
  • Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
  • Proficiency with fundamental front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Experience with JavaScript frameworks such as AngularJS, React, and Vue.js.
  • Familiarity with server-side languages like Python, Ruby, Java, PHP, and .Net.
  • Excellent knowledge of database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work in a remote environment and manage time effectively.
  • Experience with version control tools like Git.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate with teams.
==================== ADAPTIVE JOB ANALYSIS GUIDELINES ==================== 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Identify Job Type and Priorities**: - **Technical Roles**: Prioritize technical skills, hands-on experience, and project work. Reduce weight on academic certifications unless required. - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: Emphasize communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Minimize the emphasis on technical skills and projects. - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: Focus on educational qualifications and professional certifications. Minimize the emphasis on projects unless they are relevant. 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Research and Context**: - Utilize industry best practices and standards for the specific job type. - Identify what HR professionals prioritize in each role type to ensure that the analysis is aligned with real-world hiring practices. 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Comprehensive Resume Analysis**: - Extract resume details and provide a contextual analysis based on the job type. - Offer insights into what makes a candidate suitable or less suitable for the role, considering the job‚Äôs unique requirements. ==================== ADAPTIVE SCORING MODEL ==================== - **Technical Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 50 - Experience Impact: 20 - Projects and Initiative: 15 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 20 - Soft Skills: 40 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 15 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 40 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) Mapping: - score < 50 ‚Üí not_recommended - 50‚Äì69 ‚Üí consider - ‚â• 70 ‚Üí highly_recommended ==================== OUTPUT SCHEMA ==================== { "structured": { "name": string | null, "contact": { "email": string | null, "phone": string | null, "linkedin": string | null, "github": string | null, "portfolio": string | null }, "location": { "city": string | null, "country": string | null }, "current_title": string | null, "total_experience_years": number | null, "education": [ { "degree": string | null, "institution": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "experience": [ { "title": string | null, "company": string | null, "start_year": number | null, "end_year": number | "Present" | null, "highlights": [string] } ], "skills": [string], "tools": [string], "certifications": [ { "name": string | null, "issuer": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "languages": [string], "projects": [ { "name": string | null, "description": string | null, "tech": [string] } ] }, "analysis": { "score": number, "score_breakdown": { "role_fit_and_core_skills": number, "experience_impact": number, "performance_productivity": number, "retention_engagement_indicators": number, "leadership_collaboration": number, "education_certifications": number, "projects_initiative": number }, "seniorityLevel": string, "recommendation": "not_recommended" | "consider" | "recommended" | "highly_recommended", "insights": { "strengths": [string], "weaknesses": [string] } }, "ai_insights": { "matched_job_titles": [string], "ai_thought": string, "suggested_next_roles": [string] } } ==================== FINAL TASK ==================== 1. Extract structured resume data. 2. Analyze job nature and requirements. 3. Score resume based on adaptive criteria. 4. Provide insights 5. Produce recommendation. 6. Return exactly one valid JSON object.

Resume:
ALEX MORGAN
Senior Full Stack Developer
TypeScript ¬∑ Node.js ¬∑ React ¬∑ NestJS ¬∑ PostgreSQL
Email: alex.morgan@email.com
Phone: +1 (555) 234-5678
Location: San Francisco, CA
GitHub: github.com/alexmorgan
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/alexmorgan
Portfolio: alexmorgan.dev
‚ñå PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience architecting and delivering high-performance web applications using TypeScript, Node.js, and modern cloud infrastructure. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams of 8-12 engineers, designing scalable microservices architectures, and shipping production systems that serve millions of users. Deep expertise across the entire stack - from database design and API engineering to React frontends and DevOps pipelines. Passionate about clean code, developer experience, and building systems that are maintainable, observable, and cost-efficient.
‚ñå CORE TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages
TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, Bash
Backend
Node.js, NestJS, Express, Fastify
Frontend
React, Next.js, Redux, TailwindCSS
Databases
PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQLite
ORMs
Prisma, TypeORM, Sequelize, Drizzle
Cloud
AWS, GCP, Vercel, Railway, Render
DevOps
Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Terraform
Testing
Jest, Vitest, Playwright, Supertest
APIs
REST, GraphQL, WebSockets, gRPC
Message Queues
BullMQ, RabbitMQ, Kafka, SQS
AI / LLM
OpenAI API, LangChain, Anthropic SDK
Monitoring
Datadog, Sentry, Grafana, Prometheus
‚ñå WORK EXPERIENCE
Lead Full Stack Engineer
Stripe Inc.
Jan 2022 - Present
San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
Led a team of 10 engineers to redesign and rebuild Stripe's merchant dashboard using Next.js 14, TypeScript, and a NestJS microservices backend, reducing page load times by 62%.
Architected a real-time notification system using WebSockets and BullMQ, processing over 4M events per day with 99.98% delivery reliability.
Designed a multi-tenant permission system using RBAC with dynamic roles, serving 180,000+ active merchants across 40+ countries.
Introduced a type-safe API contract layer using Zod and OpenAPI codegen, eliminating an entire class of runtime type errors and reducing API-related bugs by 74%.
Built an internal developer platform (IDP) that reduced new service setup from 3 days to under 2 hours, adopted by all backend squads within 3 months.
Mentored 4 junior engineers to mid-level promotions through structured code reviews, pair programming, and system design sessions.
Led migration from a monolithic Express.js app to 12 independently deployable NestJS microservices, enabling zero-downtime deployments and independent scaling.
Implemented comprehensive observability stack: structured logging with Pino, distributed tracing with OpenTelemetry, and custom dashboards in Grafana.
Senior Backend Engineer
Vercel
Mar 2020 - Dec 2021
Remote
Contributed to the core deployment pipeline, building TypeScript services that processed 50M+ deployments per month on AWS Lambda and ECS.
Designed and implemented a build caching system using Redis and S3, reducing average build times by 45% across the platform.
Built a real-time log streaming service using Node.js streams and Server-Sent Events, enabling live build log monitoring for 2M+ developers.
Created an internal SDK (TypeScript) used by 8 internal teams to interact with deployment infrastructure, reducing integration time from weeks to hours.
Optimized PostgreSQL queries with advanced indexing strategies and materialized views, reducing p99 API latency from 850ms to 120ms.
Contributed to open-source Next.js tooling, with 3 merged PRs in the core repository improving TypeScript type inference for dynamic routes.
Implemented rate limiting and DDoS protection layer using Redis sliding window algorithm, blocking 99.7% of abusive traffic patterns.
Full Stack Developer
Shopify
Jun 2018 - Feb 2020
Ottawa, Canada (On-site)
Built and maintained merchant-facing apps using React, TypeScript, and Node.js within the Shopify App ecosystem, serving 300K+ merchants.
Developed a headless commerce SDK in TypeScript that abstracted the Storefront API, adopted by 50+ external Shopify partners.
Led the migration of a critical checkout flow from Ruby on Rails to a Node.js microservice, improving throughput by 3x during peak traffic.
Implemented automated end-to-end testing with Playwright covering 200+ critical user journeys, increasing release confidence and reducing manual QA cycles by 80%.
Designed and shipped a product recommendation engine using collaborative filtering in Node.js, increasing average order value by 12%.
Contributed to internal design system (React components + Storybook), creating 20+ reusable components with full TypeScript generics support.
Backend Developer
Twilio
Aug 2016 - May 2018
San Francisco, CA (On-site)
Built RESTful APIs in Node.js/Express serving Twilio's SMS and Voice webhooks, processing 10M+ requests daily with 99.99% uptime.
Implemented a webhook retry system with exponential backoff using BullMQ, reducing failed delivery rate from 3.2% to 0.04%.
Developed TypeScript bindings for internal gRPC services, enabling type-safe inter-service communication across 20+ microservices.
Built an analytics pipeline using Kafka and Node.js consumers that ingested and processed 200GB of event data daily into BigQuery.
Improved CI/CD pipeline on GitHub Actions, reducing build times by 55% through parallelization and intelligent test sharding.
‚ñå KEY PROJECTS
HireFlow - AI-Powered Recruitment Platform | NestJS ¬∑ TypeScript ¬∑ OpenAI ¬∑ BullMQ ¬∑ Prisma ¬∑ PostgreSQL
End-to-end recruitment automation platform with AI-driven resume analysis, real-time voice interviews, and agency management.
Built multi-tenant agency backend with NestJS + Prisma supporting 500+ concurrent agencies
Integrated OpenAI Realtime API for live voice interviews with TTS and transcription
Designed a batch resume analysis system using OpenAI Batch API (gpt-4o-mini), processing 10,000+ resumes/day at 50% cost reduction
Implemented a package-based credit system with Stripe payments, reservation logic, and race condition protection via Prisma transactions
Built real-time notification system with BullMQ queues and WebSocket push
Achieved 99.95% uptime over 12 months with zero data loss incidents
StreamSync - Real-Time Collaborative Code Editor | Node.js ¬∑ TypeScript ¬∑ WebSockets ¬∑ Redis ¬∑ React ¬∑ Monaco Editor
VS Code-like collaborative editor supporting 50+ simultaneous users per session using CRDT-based conflict resolution.
Implemented Yjs CRDT algorithm in TypeScript for conflict-free real-time text synchronization
Built presence system showing live cursors, selections, and user activity using Redis pub/sub
Designed room management with JWT-authenticated WebSocket connections and rate limiting
Achieved sub-50ms synchronization latency for users within the same region using geographic load balancing
Open-sourced the WebSocket server library, accumulated 1,200+ GitHub stars
DataPipe - TypeScript ETL Framework | TypeScript ¬∑ Node.js ¬∑ Kafka ¬∑ PostgreSQL ¬∑ Docker
Open-source ETL framework for building type-safe data pipelines with a composable operator model.
Designed a fully typed pipeline DSL using TypeScript generics and conditional types
Built adapters for 12 data sources: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, S3, Kafka, REST APIs, CSV, Excel
Implemented backpressure-aware streaming using Node.js Transform streams and async generators
Published to npm, reaching 8,000+ weekly downloads within 6 months of release
Presented at NodeConf 2023 to an audience of 600+ developers
‚ñå OPEN SOURCE CONTRIBUTIONS

Contribution
Impact
NestJS
Added support for async factory providers with full TypeScript inference, merged PR #9841
Used by 50K+ projects

Next.js

50K+ weekly downloads

30K+ weekly downloads
socket.io

Used by millions
‚ñå TECHNICAL WRITING & TALKS
"Building Type-Safe Microservices with NestJS and Prisma" - Dev.to article, 42,000+ views, featured in the NestJS newsletter
"Zero-Downtime Migrations with Prisma: A Production Guide" - Dev.to, 28,000 views

NestJS Conf 2022 - Workshop: "Production NestJS: Observability, Performance, and Scaling" (200+ attendees)
YouTube Channel: "TypeScript Patterns" - 18,000 subscribers, 200+ videos on advanced TypeScript and Node.js
‚ñå EDUCATION
B.Sc. Computer Science - Honors
University of California, Berkeley
2012 - 2016
Berkeley, CA
GPA: 3.88 / 4.00 - Dean's List all 4 years
Senior Thesis: "Optimizing Distributed State Synchronization in Collaborative Web Applications" - Awarded Best Thesis in Systems Track
Teaching Assistant for CS 162 (Operating Systems) and CS 186 (Database Systems) for 3 semesters
Co-founder of the Berkeley Web Development Club - grew membership to 400+ students
Relevant coursework: Distributed Systems, Database Internals, Algorithms, Computer Networks, Compilers

‚ñå DEEP TECHNICAL EXPERTISE
TypeScript
Advanced generics: conditional types, infer keyword, mapped types, template literal types
Compiler API usage for custom code generation and type transformations
Declaration merging, module augmentation, and ambient module declarations
Performance optimization: type inference caching, project references, incremental builds

Database schema design: normalization, denormalization trade-offs, CQRS read models
Zero-downtime schema migrations: expand-contract pattern, shadow tables, blue/green database deployments
‚ñå NOTABLE ACHIEVEMENTS
